QuestData.Title: Hello Lolo
QuestData.Description: Goutgut get sent scouting. Look at many things. Big adventure!$B$BGoutgut found secret pirate ship. Pirates all scared, run away. But ogre Lolo not run. Lolo make friend with Goutgut!$B$BGoutgut have to leave, but miss Lolo. You go say hello to Lolo for Goutgut.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Lolo the Lookout at Faldir's Cove.
QuestData.RewardText: You friends with Goutgut! Him weird ogre. Smell funny.
